description: This week, our first place winner on the insightful side is also our second place winner on the funny side. It’s from That One Guy in response to our refusal to take down our posts about Appin: Someone didn’t do their homework… If only there had been some way for Rajat Khare and Appin to […]
title: Funniest/Most Insightful Comments Of The Week At Techdirt
